long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
・Sort Ascending, Descending

2024/12/08
[NOTE]
If the icon says "No".
Are "bookmarks" and "other bookmarks" unchecked in the options page?
If they are unchecked, the folders will not be sorted and will show "No."
